==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=岁寒三友|type=22}}
{{wikipedia|Three Friends of Winter}}

===Etymology===
Pine, bamboo and plum blossoms do not wither in winter. Therefore, they are known as the '''three friends of winter'''.
